Articles.Content:
I am using 1.3.1 64bit, most times I quickload the game gets very laggy and if I switch instances (i.e. vessels, space center, etc.) I get KSP is not responding and then it crashes.

Here is my output log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1uESJbHekbDdl1W715kYGd6Fc4EnauKns

I am not getting any crash logs/dumps.

Here is my mod list

Part 1: https://prnt.sc/ijfl8a

Part 2 (The electric boogaloo): https://prnt.sc/ijflb1

Part 3: https://prnt.sc/ijfldc

Part 4: https://prnt.sc/ijflfg

Part 5: https://prnt.sc/ijflh3

Thanks.
Bump. Also anytime I leave Kerbin's SOI I get very bad performance.

I would love to help, but looking at your log file, you have over 1,262 NullReferenceException. My mod installation is around 160Mods and I only have 3. Might be missing some dependencies or some mod conflicts. A quick scan shows a lot of CollisionFX NullReferenceException errors.
